member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.GenerateSecretCode
member.summary: Generates a random 4-digit secret code for the game.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.PlayAgain
member.summary: Asks the player if they want to play the game again.
member.returns: True if the player wants to play again; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.ParseGuess(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the user input string into an integer array representing the guess.
member.param: The string input by the player.
member.returns: An integer array representing the player's guess.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.IsCorrectGuess(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Checks if the player's guess matches the secret code.
member.returns: True if the guess is correct; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.PrintHint(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Prints the hint based on the player's guess.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Game.PrintArray(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Prints the elements of an array.

member.name: T:Mastermind.Program
member.summary: Entry point of the Mastermind game console application.

member.name: M:Mastermind.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main method to start the Mastermind game.
